response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to me and I believe it would serve you exceptionally well. Given its significance and the quality it offers, I am offering it to you at a special price of $1,350,000. I trust this proposition aligns with your expectations and budget, allowing us to make a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1350000}
